name: Pluck Pop Squeeze
description:
Embrace your inner popaholic! In Pluck Pop Squeeze, endlessly simulate plucking hairs, popping pimples and squeezing blackheads to your heart's content.

Features three distinct game modes of plucking hairs, popping pimples and squeezing blackheads along with a new Jumble mode that provides a random mix of all modes.

Feel the oddly satisfying release of pulling out hairs and the building anticipation of bursting pimple after pimple. Enjoy as you squeeze out the goo from infinite blackheads.

Take it slow or just go wild popping, squeezing and plucking!

Relax, de-stress and enjoy the oddly satisfying world of Pluck Pop Squeeze!
